Memory Game

A simple memory game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Click on the cards to flip them and find the matching pairs. Your goal is to match each card with its pair in the least number of moves. The game is simple. A pair of cards will flip for 1.5 seconds. Try to remember the image and where it is in the grid. The restart will restart the easy game only. For the easy game the images are easier to remember. The hard game is more difficult as some images are monochrome and similarly shaped. Monochrome images are often harder to remember because color provides an additional "tag" of data, helping the brain process and store visual information more efficiently.
